title: Bug 116609 [Regression] Color orange doesn't work.
description: Color orange doesn't work when applied as either the font color or background color of a report item.
OB: The color orange should be applied correctly as the font color or background color of the report item.
EB: The color orange is not applied correctly as the font color or background color of the report item.
SR:
1. Insert a report item.
2. Set the font color or background color to orange.
3. Verify that the color is applied correctly.
